page.title: 09SPORT:MARTIAL ARTS,PLUMSTEAD
page.content:
I am Satinder Gill. Every Monday I go to Glydon Community Centre to do Taekwondo. First we do some warm-ups like sit-ups, push-ups, stretching kicks, knee exercises. Then we form our class. White belts go at the back, then yellow belts then orange then green, blue, red, black. After black there are dans. I am a yellow belt and have one orange promotion, my brother has got a green belt and two blue promotions. Our club might be taking part in the next Olympics because the Olympics will be held in Korea and Taekwondo comes from Korea.
Satinder Gill Age 10yrs.
